website_summaries.verdict: When used as directed, this peel can potentially provide almost professional-level results with smoother, clearer skin – impressive performance for a chemical peel you can do at home.
pros: A 50% glycolic acid peel with a gel-like consistency that makes it less messy than liquid solutions
Produces results for most users for a variety of skin issues by clarifying skin and stimulating collagen production
cons: Caution must be taken to follow the instructions closely to prevent chemical burns
May be too harsh for very sensitive skin
Use of a neutralizer is recommended

customer_reviews.title: The product is working like it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: The product is working like it is supposed to. I think I might do better with a TCA peel, but wanted to start with a less invasive product. I have dark spots which after one treatment are slightly lighter and some fine lines diminished. I was scared so I only left on for 2 minutes. the second treatment I left for 10 minutes and it has only been a couple days. so this product is wonderful for anyone who has patience. I will do this once a week for 6 weeks and then be able to give a more thorough review. There is no down time with this product. Activities and make-up as usual. (flakiness for a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Renee White

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Incredible results.
customer_reviews.text: I am a black man with problems with razor blade and one friend told me about this product as a treatment before shaving and two days after. This product is not only helping me with the allergy but also it is fading the hyper-pigmentation in that area. It is amazing! But be careful with this product. I leave it on my face for exactly three to five minutes and it's been enough of time for me to have great results without problems. Never use hot or warm water to wash your face with this product. Wet a towel with cold/cool water or just wash your face with cold/cool water. Sunscreen is mandatory SPF 45+. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Acne Reduction
customer_reviews.text: I do this I once a week and I've seen a 80% reduction in my acne. I have been on hundreds of dollars worth of pills and creams from a dermatologist over the last 3 years... and none of them have given me this much of a reduction. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Miles

customer_reviews.title: A good product.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it a few times. I recommend getting a fan, and fanning your face during application. This will reduce the pain sensation. Also, rinse with baking soda water to immediately stop burning. Glycolic Acid peels are always a great way to exfoliate, remove dead skin and prevent premature aging. This product does that. But use it wisely and carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Ruwaine Gutierrez Parrish

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE - SEE PICTURES
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE! I've used other brand chemical peel solutions before that I've purchased through Amazon, so I'm not someone trying this for the first time. I have a lot of experience using them. I put this chemical peel solution on my face on a quarter size area of my temple. It immediately spread and melted through 3 layers of skin in the time it took from application until the neutralizing agent set in. The picture I attached to this review was after 3 days off medical attention. Needless to say the picture doesn't show the full extent of the damage caused by this chemical peel.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Gibeault

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had horrible acne scars that wouldn’t go away for years and ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had horrible acne scars that wouldn’t go away for years and this product along with the neutralizer is the only thing that worked for me. It doesn’t make your skin peel off but it definitely makes your skin clearer, brighter and reveals an even skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Adizua

customer_reviews.title: Don't Do It!
customer_reviews.text: My experience with this was an absolute disaster and I wish I had never purchased it. It burned my face so badly - I had several spots that were scabby for a week! I did follow the directions and maybe the 50% solution was too potent for my skin. I would not recommend doing this yourself. Go to a dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. The gel formula helps to keep the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. The gel formula helps to keep the peel “only where you want it”, without worry of getting the product in unwanted areas. I’m almost 50, though my skin looks 35. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Smooth outcome
customer_reviews.text: Burned and stung initially. Make sure your face is clean and toned( I used an alcoholic wipe but witch hazel would work also). I applaud with my fingers being car fuel to avoid eye(lids and under eyes) area. Left it on for 4 minutes and rinsed with a solution of water and 2 tbs of baking soda to neutralize until completely removed. Moisturized generously. My skin felt super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Kmac

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well as a light peel. Minimal redness ...
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well as a light peel. Minimal redness occurred and results were noticeable the next day. I had smaller pores, smoother skin and reduced hyperpigmentation which I get after prolonged sun exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Taya Taube

customer_reviews.title: No effect.  Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this twice with absolutely no effect. First time 3 minutes. Second time 4. It did tingle when applied but no redness no peeling. Previous peels I’ve used resulted in redness and peeling which I believe is the desired effect. Total rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: The reviews were really good and I bought it and used it just one ...
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were really good and I bought it and used it just one time for 2 minutes.(It said 1-3 minutes) Now I have dark spots became so dark and I have even more than before!!! I thought they would go away over time but no way! So sad..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: need to purchase the neutralizing solution with this product
customer_reviews.text: I think this should come with instructions for use in a font large enough to read without a magnifying glass. they require that you get the instructions from a website
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No instructions and uncertain expections.
customer_reviews.text: Lack of instructions. The web page did not explain what results to expect. I thought this was a product that you put on, let dry, and peeled off. Nope. Nothing but some tingling. Where does the peel come in?
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: My Face Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this product. I have sun spots and uneven skin tone as well as large pores that make-up can’t conceal. After using this product three times there is a huge noticeable difference. I have even gotten compliments which hasn’t happened in a long time. The bottle did not come with directions but a quick search of the internet took care of that. Be sure to use it exactly as directed and you should be pleased with the results as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Imfuente

customer_reviews.title: Very strong
customer_reviews.text: If you're not used to the 50% concentration it can be mixed with water until your skin adapts to it. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna King

customer_reviews.title: Follow instructions!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this peel a couple times so far and am in love. My face is extremely soft immediately after use. I have noticed my pores are not as big and the blackheads on my nose have started to disappear. Make sure you follow the instructions, there are a lot of steps but you get the hang of it after the first time. Only downside I’ve noticed is that the sides of my nose have started to become dry and patchy but I may have not applied enough Vaseline around it the first time so make sure to use enough and to moisturize heavily, especially in those sensitive areas. Will up date review if I experience any other changes!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki D

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as i thought it would be at 50%.
customer_reviews.text: My skin is in between.sometimes more sensitive on days than others& some not to bad. It did sting.left on about 2minutes.stung mostly on sides of my nose. I only have fine lines, but saggy jaws from weight up n down from past medications. I only peeled a little near my nose. Ill use it a couple more times & hopefully ill see what others see in there skin.smooth, tight& even. If not.I will be mad to pay for something that doesnt do what it promises it will do. It is more like a gel. Dont know if i can update.im noticing amazon is not letting me update my reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs customer

customer_reviews.title: i see an improvement.
customer_reviews.text: this was first time using a peel. it did burn, but it was not as bad as i thought. i was nervous after i washed my face and i seen all these bumps, but they were gone by morning. i did have just a few small patches of peeling skin. in 3 days my skin was clear, but the areas are still sensitive. im happy with the results and will be doing another treatment next month.
customer_reviews.author: T. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Smoother skin
customer_reviews.text: It does not come with instructions. I recommend looking up how to use it online and dont forget to use a neutralizer. I have noticed smoother skin and less blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Skin refine...
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered for the first time and tried the product a couple of nights ago. Really easy to apply, and I was careful with the time. I did 1.30 min. before adding the Neutralizer. (using a separate brand for this step). Really love the way my skin feel, almost immediate results. Two days later and feels really good. The only reason for the 4 instead or 5 stars, is the directions weren't too clear for me at the time of ordering, also little information on how often can this be done. I look forward to continue to use the peel, and looking into more of the other products
customer_reviews.author: Angieh

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Will not damage skin
customer_reviews.text: I clean my face, then use isopropyl alcohol to strip oil and do a double layer application of this peel (one layer, wait five minutes do another layer and leave it on another five minutes). I achieve a good peel with 10 minutes time (some vendors say you can leave 50% on up to 20 minutes). It burns a little but it is supposed to. An intense gym workout is much more uncomfortable. I’m read for a couple hours after but within two days back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Strong product that burns but works.
customer_reviews.text: It is very strong. I looked at the 70% briefly and I’m really glad I chose the 50%. The 50% acid peel is painful enough but it seems to be working. I have a darkened patch under my chin from pcos and hyperpigmentation. It’s softening it and peeling it. I can already see a difference and it’s just been a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi M.

customer_reviews.title: works, but use with caution
customer_reviews.text: Works!!! OK, It will burn your face. But, That's what chemical peels are. Use it with caution. And I recommend using it on a day where you'll be home for a few days. Your face will be red and possibly a bit sore. Leave it on for less time or buy a lesser strength. I've paid a lot of money for a professional peel and this was much more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful skincare item!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that is helping to control my very oily skin. I'm up to 5 minutes and so happy it's a gel formula, no drips. My only issue is that it's a safety cap and challenging to open every time due to arthritic hands, but will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this! I tried it for the first time, following directions I found on YouTube, and the results were great. It lightened an age spot, and reduced acne scarring that I have on my chin
customer_reviews.author: susan p wolfe

customer_reviews.title: 50%??? Not even close. Nothing happened to my face even after using twice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after reading all the positive reviews, but terribly disappointed. I used it twice , one week apart as per the directions and nothing happened to my skin, not even a spot of peeling onmy face . I doubt the strength of the product... 50% ????? Not even close. Don’t waste your money in it.
customer_reviews.author: shamna

customer_reviews.title: Great treatment for KP
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to help with kp on my face. I've been hiding my face for so long, it's so embarrassing. This product is the only thing that has helped. My skin is looking better after just one use. Can't wait for the results after a few applications. This peel is strong but it really does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Todmommy2015

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product. not strong enough. the previous (70%) was better, but Amazon didn't have anymore so I tried the(50%) if your issuing refunds I would rather you send me a bottle of the (70%),,,,,,I was using the product for a skin peel around my ankle area.
customer_reviews.author: Net

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I use it once a week just to brighten & smooth complexion. It’s a great addition to your facial routine. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Marko

customer_reviews.title: A must in your skincare routine
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I use it at least twice a week in the shower while I’m shaving my legs. I like to leave it on for about 5-7minutes. It’s like the tanning bed, you will want to work your way up to the 5 minutes. This stuff definitely works because I had a chemical burn from it once so use with caution. I have tried several products from this brand and they are all amazing. I feel like this product has done wonders for my breakouts and wrinkles. If you are using it for acne, I would suggest using it BEFORE you try to pop any pimples. Don’t use this on any open areas.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This peel is amazing! Follow the instructions and don’t forget to cleanse your face, then clean off with alcohol before applying the product. It took 2 days for a scar that I’ve had for years to completely disappear! Apply avocado butter to sooth and heal your skin. Works fast and was not too strong. If used correctly you can get the results portrayed in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Beach

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight does not burn. I keep it on longer after first testing it. They say 1 to 3 minutes. I leave it on for 5 minutes, start to feel a slight tingling sensation and put water on it and very gently pay dry. I have seen an improvement in my skin texture, but not tone. I guess I will need many treatments to get the age spots to disappear. I use the product on my face, neck and hands.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH CLAY

customer_reviews.title: Great product for skin texture
customer_reviews.text: In short, this product rocks. I bought the 50% gel peel and it's been incredible for my skin's texture and brown spots (for reference, I'm olive complected and in my early 40s). This product is easy to apply and pretty straight forward. I'll definitely be buying it again. Highly recommend this brand. I'm pretty Type A about reading reviews and making sure a company is truly selling quality products that actually work (versus buying positive reviews). This company is legit. I've purchased 3 of their products now. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: sasha s.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Formula
customer_reviews.text: The formula seems to be inconsistent from bottle to bottle. I am able to use this multiple times per week without consequence. A 50% should be more harsh. It does open the pores to scrub out dirt and oil. It does not cause peeling for my skin. I am Mediterranean with olive skin that tans easily. Not too oily, not too dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that this works practically as well as at the dermatologist office. I have used it three times since I have purchased it to make sure that this product works. I am happy with my decision to buy this. It works well for me. You do have to be careful not to blotch on so much product on the cotton balls to apply. A clean even amount is needed to get good results. Make sure to wash it off using room temp water with baking soda which neutralizes it, and removes from your pores. If you do not remove it well it will stay and still give you an itchy feeling and irritate your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: My pores seem much smaller the dark spots on my face are getting lighter. I started out leaving it one for one minute then gradually over a period of a couple of weeks, I'm leaving it on for four minutes. You need to use an oil free toner on a clean face before applying the product. I use just plain rubbing alcohol. To neutralize, I use a couple of tablespoons of baking soda in 2 or 3 cups of water. I'm going to try the 70% next time.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Slowly but surely
customer_reviews.text: I dose what is says very slowly but surely. Don’t burn at all. I saw a reviewer said you must degrease the face with either witch hazel or an isopropyl alcohol solution or the acid will not penetrate. She is very right. I haven’t seen any results until i used isopropyl alcohol solution to clean my face and do nutralize afterward. I also think it is not as strong as it says but it worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Raiana Zaman

customer_reviews.title: Freshens your face hard to call a peel with this concentration
customer_reviews.text: I bought us to add to the same brand but a week your concentration. I still don’t feel like any of them are very strong but you don’t have to worry about bringing your face either. Works for freshening up your skin it’s just hard to really call it a p I bought us to add to the same brand of but a weaker concentration. I still don’t feel like any of them are very strong but you don’t have to worry about burning your face either. Works for freshening up your skin it’s just hard to really call it a peel.
customer_reviews.author: CAKatwoman

customer_reviews.title: Follow. The. Directions.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I urge you to follow directions and start by only applying for a minute. Work your way up to 3 minutes. It is very strong and it’s going to burn. I use baking soda mixed with water to neutralize and be warned, the neutralization burns more than the product itself. I apply rose hip oil and heavily moisturize after using. My pores have shrunk and I have a great glow to my skin. Can’t say enough good things about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Gunther

customer_reviews.title: Clear beautiful skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is very strong so becareful when using this. If your buying the glycolic acid you need the neaitrilizer to go along with it to activate the chemical. It worked perfectly to peel away the dead skin on my face, neck and arms area. I have KP on my arms this is the only product that has effectvly worked to clear up those pesky little bumps! Again, you want to use this AS DIRECTED don’t leave it on any longer as you can easily burn yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Zambri

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I was looking for. I have very oily skin and poor skin tone due to hyperpigmentation. I've been using this peel for about 2 months, and it's improved my skin a great deal. I treat my skin once about every 1-2 weeks (along with using a 50+ SPF sunscreen), and I'm happy with the results. I'll very likely purchase this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: flightsoffancy22

customer_reviews.title: alright
customer_reviews.text: It works but you have to leave it on for at least 5 min, not max two min. Doesn't seem as powerful, makes me think someone has diluted this so they can sell more...
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Stings like..., well, you know what.
customer_reviews.text: This is too strong of a mixture - could only stand it for about 30 seconds yet it still left "burns" on my face even where I applied the neutralizer twice! Attempted to use it a second time with water to thin it out, but it was still waaayyy too potent! I've used Boots No. 7 Glycolic peel for years with wonderful results and had hoped to replace it when it was discontinued, but this is NOT the stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work dont waste your money! Just because it cost more it’s not better!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in the summer and waited until September to do the treatment since it was going to be cooler and I needed to avoid the sun. I wish I would have done it sooner to get a refund. I didn’t even frost instead it left burned spots. I will never buy this product or any other product from this brand after my experience. Next time I’m going to buy chemical peels without the gel and from a different brand. I been doing chemical peels for a long time it was nothing close to the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: because
customer_reviews.text: I have no issue with this product I’ve only used it twice yes a dusting but anyone who knows anything about aPeel would know that you can’t leave it on that long and everyone skin type is different yet to follow the Fitzpatrick scale or if you have any other skin healthy shoes anyhow I can’t really see what I’m typing so I hope this is coming out right but yes I did use the PO if you times and I didn’t have any problems yes I did leave a little bit of red marking that because I never neutralized it so that was my own fault
customer_reviews.author: julie Deuel

customer_reviews.title: No peel glow
customer_reviews.text: I have been following the manufacturer's instructions and not left the peel on for more than 5mins and I have not peeled. My body absorbs things quickly, but my skin is glowing. On my next application I will leave on for
customer_reviews.author: Shangti

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, works as expected. I was used to a 20% glycolic solution. I put this solution on for 2 minutes and my skin was tight and felt a little like I had a sunburn-although it was not red. I am on day 2 and there is a lttle peeling-nothing serious but I am going to wait a week and only leave it on for 1 minute this time. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Spears

customer_reviews.title: Professional strength product
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this product twice, but am quite pleased with the results. Having had many glycolic peels over the years as well as having done them professionally, I recognize the early-treatment indications that the product is doing what I expected it to do. I am also pleased that despite its strength, this product isn't harsh the way the earlier glycolic solutions of this strength used to be. I look forward to the unfolding improvement in my skin. Thank you for making a clinical strength product available online.
customer_reviews.author: kipuka444

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I used this twice and don't see the results I had with another brand. The eyedropper is really flimsy and would recommend getting another one to use. It's a good value for the price, but not sure I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Micro Prof

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions to the letter! I left it ...
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions to the letter! I left it on and extra 2 minutes and got burns and blisters. Hey, it works!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I did like the product, my skin was smooth and looks better. But you definitely have to do it a couple of times before seeing the full results. Also, when buying the product they should add that you NEED a neutralizer with it. Maybe they did and I didn’t see it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is meant to do! I’m in the beauty business and I’ve had peels at other places before trying this product, and this product is just as good as all others. My face looks fabulous the next day and only gets better each day after. Please take care when using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons #1 Customer

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back!!
customer_reviews.text: Just didn’t do anything for my face! I’ve given him ample opportunity and many chances but it turned out to be a waste of money which is a shame because I bought several of them.
customer_reviews.author: 3rd Degree Serious

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product to see if it would help ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to see if it would help with my overall skin appearance and acne. I found that it helped dry out my existing acne and reduced my breakouts. Obviously, everyone has different skin so it may not work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: AZshopper

customer_reviews.title: I've used it three times now and I can truthfully ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used it three times now and I can truthfully say it's working. I've used professional grade in the past years and, yes, this works! I'll purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Should be applied by a professional
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: please don’t use except if you are, or know a professional cosmetician or esthetician. Improper application can damage your skin! That being said, after my skin (and daughter’s skin) are used to glycolic acid applied in increasing strengths, our cosmetician friend will apply the peel. Glycolic acid is useful for peeling the outer skin layers to brighten skin with acne scars, age spots, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lewie D

customer_reviews.title: Great for large pore areas
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t experience any peeling but I’ve since found out this wasn’t designed for peeling, it’s more for exfoliating. It definitely is worth the money though. When I used it on my whole face my skin was a bit dry the next few days, but it’s amazing at fixing large pores so I’m going to continue using it as a spot treatment around my nose and on my chin.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey larsen

customer_reviews.title: Don't use!  Burned and scarred my face!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I use this to fix some minor discoloration on my forehead, it made the situation a million times worse! Used as directed and it left a big quarter size spot on my forehead! Headed to the dermatologist to see if I can get it fixed!
customer_reviews.author: cleanmoto

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Pores and Brighter Skin
customer_reviews.text: I'm 57 and currently work for a facility that provides glycolic peels for patients. When I saw this could be purchased on line, I decided to try this myself. The 30% didn't have much effect, but everyone's sensitivity is different. I ordered the 50% and absolutely love it! I use it twice a week. I can tell a difference in my skin, smaller pores and definitely brighter. Other people have asked what I'm doing! I'll continue to use just takes about three minutes and I'm done!
customer_reviews.author: Bre1998

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this did what is supposed to do. I do believe it worked for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: coffey brown

customer_reviews.title: Works completely as expected
customer_reviews.text: I find this product does very well. It is gentle, yet effective. I think the key is to start out slowly. Only leave it on maybe 3 minutes the first time. And don't be discouraged if you don't see results right away. Peeling or wiping away of dead skin can take 3 days to 3 weeks. Be patient and try again. Worked great for age spots on my face and my face is looking better overall. Use a good moisturizer daily and sunscreen if exposed.
customer_reviews.author: William A.

customer_reviews.title: well I hate to say I hate anything so I gave it ...
customer_reviews.text: well I hate to say I hate anything so I gave it 2 stars. It might have been just my face or something I had used on my face. But I followed directions for this type of peel. The first time was the same as today. It started burning asap, but I was determined that I would leave it on for 3 mins. Not going to happen. Just be careful and test on the parts you are going to use it on.
customer_reviews.author: mathis green

customer_reviews.title: This product should only be sold with the neutralizing agent and instructions!
customer_reviews.text: I should have been advised that this product should have come with instructions in the package and the neutralizing agent! I have burn scars.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliates but not great if you are looking for a peel
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t really do a lot. It seems to burn around my nose and I used a baking soda mixture to neutralize afterwards. I also bought the Peptide Serum as they suggested afterwards so I don’t know if this helped with no peeling or if it is just so light that it didn’t make me peel. May work as an exfoliant but not for a good peel.
customer_reviews.author: TPerry74

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Results! !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled my ENTIRE life with problem skin, large pores & breakouts.. I cannot remember ever having the results I have now from a product... It's a cure for skin like mine. Dissolved blackheads, is smoothing my skin from scars & tighten while wrinkles are diminishing the longer I use this product. I'm a life long buyer of the full line of skin care.... I use as directed and am thrilled beyond belief over the results. I would also recommend it for youngsters who are beginning the journey as preventing a life of skin problems.
customer_reviews.author: Padie

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any tingle at all.  :(
customer_reviews.text: And they packed it so poorly that I snipped the tip of the dropper off when opening it. Luckily, I had another top to put on. But I've used other peels at 40% or less that gave me more of a tingle & fresher skin than this one. Not a fan. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it's ok.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it was worth trying. It worked a little but I need something stronger or possibly need to try leaving it on longer. I have sensitive skin so I only left it on for 5 minutes. It stung a little (but tolerable) and it did scab up on some of my areas but no big noticeable change. I'll leave it on longer and send another review later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well, I have not used the 50%. Bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have not used the 50%. Bottle yet. But I also purchased 30% and have used it twice. I am still looking for results! It stings so , I guess it is working.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: No noticeable changes in dark spots or lines om face or back of hands.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend and buy again
customer_reviews.text: Be careful not to leave on too long. This stuff will peel layers off. But - it does work. Would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Im completely satisfied with this purchase.... this works great as long as you follow the instructions. Another way to neutralize the acid is to use a foaming soap and water or water mixed with baking soda! I washed my face then applied the peel , waited 3 min then washed off with soap and water and it was amazing! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: My skin is looking so much better.
customer_reviews.text: Just did another 3 minute peel today. My skin is looking so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: First time using and can already feel a difference. Smoother skin and less dark spots.
customer_reviews.author: glen Leslie

customer_reviews.title: False
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed dissatisfied such a wasn't of time and funds I read the reviews and believed the hype it nothing but falseness ,I'm so disappointed I was looking forward to better skin my skin not to bad so it you have terrible skin Don't buy it's a waste people work to hard for funds they do have to waste it this is a no-no not acceptable
customer_reviews.author: QGM

customer_reviews.title: A must beauty routine!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 uses I can already see my pores shrinking, smoother skin and a reduction of my acne scars making them less noticeable. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Waller 2

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please use with caution--this is a powerful and effective product. A little-bit goes a long way. Makes skin tight and glass-like.Make certain after you rinse to use a good moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How to identify the condition?
customer_reviews.text: If you don't like how they look or feel, or the condition is bothersome, they can be removed using several methods--freezing being the most well known. They do not go away on their own. My condition is not an inherited family condition, and I chose to use Glycolic Acid 50% Gel Peel with Chamomile and Green Tea Extracts. It is a very simple product to use and works well if you begin to use it when you notice the beginning of a growth.
customer_reviews.author: PMD

customer_reviews.title: Only get one bottle - pic misleading ... READ DETAILS :)
customer_reviews.text: Returning because thought I was getting 3 bottles based on pic for price.
customer_reviews.author: J. MCDONALD

customer_reviews.title: Love my new smooth skin...
customer_reviews.text: I saw instant results after the first application. I love this product. I really appreciate the instructions that were sent to my email once my chemical peel arrived also. Great service!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: The Glycolic Seems Best for Sun Damage
customer_reviews.text: I started using this on arms and chest first and noticed that it lifts the sun damage to the surface where it scabs and flakes off. After a few uses using every 3 or 4 weeks, the sun spots are gone. Works really great on chest and face although I would suggest a more gentle approach on the face with shorter application time, less product plus longer healing time.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Scott

customer_reviews.title: It will burn you knob
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product it Burt my skin the minute I applied,I called the company and they told me they could not do anything about it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trust the suggestions and begin with the 30% or lesser
customer_reviews.text: Online directions were pretty clear, I did go against the online reviews and suggestions of starting with the lesser percentage and got the 50%. I do wish I would have listened and will be ordering the 30%. The 50% is too intense therefore not giving the desired outcome although with what I have been able to experience with the 50% I am sure that it does its job great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Chandler

customer_reviews.title: BURNS! In a good way :)
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is no joke! Start with just a couple of minutes of treatment - even if (like me) you’ve used acid peels a million times I also got the neutralizer. It was a good choice, but you can also use baking soda in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t work at all. I have done 50% peels before and it would burn so much more. Left this on for 10 min and got slight tingling. No peeling at all. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions step by step. It burned like he.. . Did it 4 days ago. No change what so ever. I used it for large poors and fine lines but had no change what so ever. Left it on 3 min.
customer_reviews.author: daniela Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Works as indicated
customer_reviews.text: Sloughs off dead skin, complexion is much smoother a few days after use. Does not irritate my fair, sensitive skin. Has improved signs of sun damage on face, neck and chest.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi T

customer_reviews.title: Strong, be careful !
customer_reviews.text: Very strong. I haven't put on my face but tried it first on my arms. My arms have alot of sundamage. Didn't have any peeling with first application . I am sure you should go slow and easy and try it in less conspicuous areas first to see how you tolerate this strength. I will try it again
customer_reviews.author: Pete J.

customer_reviews.title: No more $80 peels for me!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! This product does more than the peels I receive from my dermatologist at a fraction of the price. Only thing necessary is to follow the directions carefully.
customer_reviews.author: djharris14

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good light peel. Peel last 7-10 days to completely finish peeling
customer_reviews.author: Z. Macias

customer_reviews.title: the results will amaze you. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This stuff really works. It certainly tingles when you put it on so if you can get past that, the results will amaze you. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie K

customer_reviews.title: Glycolic Acid
customer_reviews.text: Product does do a great peel and I will buy it again. Its just a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer mr3

customer_reviews.title: My face is on fiiiyah, my face is on fiyyyah!
customer_reviews.text: My face is on fiiyyyaahh! My face is on fiyyah! Yes. Got it tonight. Tried it tonight. Some burning, stinging, holy hell. Felt skin was tight after. Already can tell a difference. Will update tomorrow and in a few days on my results. Pores were gimormous before. Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewingQueen

customer_reviews.title: Strong, effective.
customer_reviews.text: Wow and wow. I put a nice layer on my forehead and the next day a sheet of dead skin peeled off. Looks like I had a salon treatment.
customer_reviews.author: cathy marshall

customer_reviews.title: Regular
customer_reviews.text: It is not as strong as I expected. I've used it a more than 5 times now and I don't much change or difference.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey Bermudez Arce

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy it was to apply and how the website was very detailed. My skin was burning but it wasnt that bad...i used the neutralizer along with this and now yes, my skin is peeling ....in a good way lol cant wait to come back next month with an update , love it so far
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It really works; however, if you are new to peels the strength may be too much. I suggest watering the peel down or leaving it on no more than 4 minutes. I have noticed some lightening of dark spots and acne marks since using. Don’t be overly aggressive in using since it is such a high strength. Be patient.
customer_reviews.author: SLafP

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a month ago and only thing it does when I apply it is that it leaves my skin really soft. But the reason why I bought this was to improve the appearance of my face. As for the neutralizer, what I use is baking soda (I bought at Walmart a tiny box for under a dollar lol) mixed with water! It’s works just the same as the neutralizer they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Giovana Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Be Your Own Skincare Expert
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions and it will give you amazing results. Skin softer than I could ever remember. Saving $1000's doing it at home.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: worked well
customer_reviews.text: worked well after first use. Follow directions provided online exactly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
